data.description_html:
For the duration of soldiers of sanctity, you gain a bonus on turning checks and turning damage rolls made when you have allies within 30 feet of you. This is a sacred bonus, equal to the number of allies within 30 feet, to a maximum of +6.

In addition, each target gains a +2 bonus to AC against all attacks made by undead creatures. This bonus applies for the duration of the spell as long as an ally is within 30 feet of you.
data.name: Soldiers of Sanctity
data.target: You, plus one willing creature/2 levels; see text
